name: AxSoft Hub
tagline: AxSoft Hub: All the information you need about Axol and AxSoft.
body:
### Welcome to AxSoft Hub.
AxSoft hub was made to help you view some of the information about Axol/AxSoft, or just make it easier to find it.

### Download Program
Download the .exe version of the program [here](http://download.axol.tk/axsoft/hub/current/hub-setup.exe)

### System Requirements
.NET Framework 4.5.2
Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10/

### Other Information
This program was coded in C# in Visual Studio 2015.

### Authors and Contributors
This program was coded, programmed, and bug tested by Corey Martin, owner of Axol and AxSoft.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? [Contact support](mailto:ceo@axol.tk) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
